data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 4, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira awards Belenenses a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Guimaraes needs to be cautious. Belenenses have an attacking throw-in.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Falaye Sacko of Guimaraes gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the away team in Guimaraes.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Belenenses push upfield but Manuel Oliveira quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lyle Foster for Guimaraes is whistled offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Manuel Oliveira signals a throw-in for Belenenses, close to Guimaraes's area.
In the minute 14, Manuel Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Guimaraes pushes forward through Nicolas Janvier, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 16, In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
In the minute 19, Guimaraes drive upfield and Nicolas Janvier gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Belenenses defender.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Belenenses.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Belenenses close to the penalty box.
Silvestre Varela of Belenenses smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 23, Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Belenenses.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marcus Edwards for Guimaraes who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 26, Manuel Oliveira signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Marcus Edwards is back on his feet again.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
In the minute 29, Lyle Foster (Guimaraes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Guimaraes's Nicolas Janvier misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 30, Manuel Oliveira awards Belenenses a goal kick.
Throw-in for Guimaraes close to the penalty box.
Andre Andre (Guimaraes) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 32, Can Guimaraes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Belenenses's half?
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Lyle Foster for Guimaraes drives towards goal at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Manuel Oliveira signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In Guimaraes Guimaraes attack through Marcus Edwards. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
In the minute 33, Free kick Belenenses.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Belenenses.
Guimaraes are pushing forward but Andre Andre's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guimaraes.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Belenenses.
In Guimaraes, Guimaraes push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 42, Manuel Oliveira signals a Belenenses throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Guimaraes.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 44, Henrique (Belenenses) gets a yellow card.
Belenenses have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Belenenses are coming forward and Henrique gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Guimaraes.
In the minute 45, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 47, Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Phete.
Great play from Ruben Lima to set up the goal.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Falaye Sacko of Guimaraes gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the away team in Guimaraes.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
At Dom Afonso Henriques, Caue has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 53, Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Belenenses in Guimaraes.
In the minute 55, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Can Belenenses capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guimaraes's half?
Free kick Belenenses.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Belenenses.
Belenenses's Miguel Cardoso has been booked in Guimaraes.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 61, Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Guimaraes.
The home team replace Marcus Edwards with Ricardo Quaresma.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 63, Noah Jean Holm is replacing Lyle Foster for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
The away team have replaced Caue with Bruno Ramires. This is the first substitution made today by Petit.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Andre Andre for Guimaraes has been booked by Manuel Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Guimaraes.
Manuel Oliveira awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Afonso Sousa is replacing Silvestre Varela for the away team.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Guimaraes make their third substitution with Denis Poha replacing Pepelu.
In the minute 71, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Belenenses just outside Guimaraes's area.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
In the minute 74, Belenenses will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Guimaraes.
Afonso Taira (Belenenses) has received a yellow card from Manuel Oliveira.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
In the minute 76, Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Free kick Guimaraes.
At Dom Afonso Henriques, Guimaraes are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Belenenses at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Belenenses needs to be cautious. Guimaraes have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 83, Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Manuel Oliveira signals a throw-in for Belenenses, close to Guimaraes's area.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Belenenses.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Free kick in a good position for Guimaraes!
In the minute 87, Guimaraes have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Guimaraes in Guimaraes.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
In the minute 89, Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Manuel Oliveira will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Afonso Sousa has recovered and rejoins the match in Guimaraes.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Mateo Cassierra gets his shot on target but fails to score for Belenenses.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Rochinha (Guimaraes) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Belenenses have a goal kick.
Belenenses's Afonso Sousa gets in a shot on goal at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Manuel Oliveira blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
Afonso Sousa is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
